title: dogenero
author: dogenero
content: DogeneroPrivacy is a Doge's rightDogenero is a privacy-respecting and CPU-mineable software fork of Monero.It's the privacy coin that makes people smile!Dogenero has an initial subsidy of 18 446 744 coins over ~4 years,followed by a tail-emission of 0.5 dogenero per minute.Website: https://dogenero.orgSource code: https://github.com/dogenero/DogeneroCLI wallet: https://github.com/dogenero/Dogenero/releasesGUI wallet: work-in-progressReddit: https://reddit.com/r/dogeneroMatrix: https://matrix.to/#/#dogenero:matrix.org

comments.author: dogenero
comments.body: Quote from: LuciferTula on October 04, 2022, 03:51:43 PMdogenerod: "Invalid DNSSEC TXT record signature for updates.dogenero.org: validation failure <updates.dogenero.org. TXT IN>: no keys have a DS with algorithm RSASHA256 no two valid DNS"What can i do?That message is harmless, it only means that the updates domain hasn't been set up.

comments.author: talkshi
comments.body: Same here, this doesn't work. What a dissapointment.
